title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4005.4 - Pari-mutuel employees forbidden to bet
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4005.4 - Pari-mutuel employees forbidden to bet

State Regulations

No employee of the pari-mutuel department of any
licensed association shall be permitted to bet during those periods of any day
on which such person is actually working in such capacity. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4005.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
